strats.note: With a precise enough jump, it's possible to avoid acid damage without a shinespark.

Grapple Bottom Right Door (to Jump Room)
Grapple Beam

strats.name: X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 2 screens.

nodes.name: Grapple Tutorial Room 1 Left Door (to Grapple)
Grapple Tutorial Room 1 Right Door (to Grapple Tutorial 2)
Grapple Tutorial Room 2 Left Door (to Grapple Tutorial 1)
Grapple Tutorial Room 2 Right Door (to Grapple Tutorial 3)
Grapple Tutorial Room 3 Left Door (to Grapple Tutorial 2)
Grapple Tutorial Room 3 Right Door (to Shaft)
Grapple Tutorial Room 3 Junction (Left of Green Gate)
Grapple Tutorial Room 3 Junction (Center Platform)

strats.name: Grapple Tutorial 3 Frozen Gamet Bridge
note: Lead a Gamet up through the water and freeze it to cross the first moat.
Freeze the Gamet before it starts moving left.
Wait for it to thaw and fly over the second moat where it can be frozen again.

strats.name: Grapple Tutorial 3 Double Gamet Boost
note: 1- Stand near the farm point, on the edge of where you make Gamets spawn.
2- Wait for the water position to be high.
3- Move to make the Gamets spawn. Moonwalk is useful here.
4- Quickly climb up to the last ledge before the door.
5- Run, jump, dboost off a Gamet.
6- Dboost a second time off the Gamet to cross the second moat.

strats.name: Speedy SpringBall Jump
strats.note: With enough run speed, jump over the first moat and MockBall into a regular springball jump over the second moat.

strats.name: Grapple Tutorial Gamet Boost
note: 1- Stand near the farm point, on the edge of where you make Gamets spawn.
2- Wait for the water position to be high.
3- Move to make the Gamets spawn. Moonwalk is useful here.
4- Quickly climb up to the last ledge before the door.
5- Run, jump, dboost off a Gamet.

strats.name: Suitless SpringBall Jump
strats.note: Wait for the water to be rising and perform a max height SpringBall Jump.

strats.name: Fight Puyo
strats.note: Kill either the leftmost puyo or jump into the right side of the water and fight all the puyos.

strats.name: Gravity and Ice
strats.note: Either freeze the Puyos immediately on the stairs, or at the highest part of their jump to barely jump up to the ledge with HiJump.

strats.name: Tricky Jump
note: Run and jump at the very edge of the center platform.
Wait for the water level to begin lowering to walljump on the far edge.
An airball may be a little easier.

strats.name: Suitless Double SpringBall Jump
strats.note: Jump when the water level is at its lowest.

nodes.name: Post Crocomire Farming Room Left Door (to Power Bombs)
Post Crocomire Farming Room Bottom Door (to Shaft)
Post Crocomire Farming Room Bottom Right Door (to Save)
Post Crocomire Farming Room Top Right Door (to Crocomire)
Post Crocomire Farming Room Main Junction

strats.name: Ripper Grapple
strats.note: Involves grappling off a Ripper 2.

strats.name: Use Frozen Enemies
strats.note: Use the moving platform (Kamer) to elevate the Gamets and then freeze them.

strats.name: Hi Jump from Moving Platform
strats.note: Run on the moving platform (Kamer).

strats.name: Post Crocomire Farming Room Speed Jump
note: Doesn't require opening the bottom right door, even. Just using the available space and jumping late enough.
It does require killing the Gamets and leaving the drops there so they don't kill your momentum.

strats.name: Post Crocomire Farming Room Damage Boost
strats.note: Use the moving platform (Kamer) to elevate the Gamets.

strats.name: Ripper Grapple
strats.note: Involves grappling off a Ripper 2.

strats.name: Use Frozen Enemies
strats.note: Use the moving platform (Kamer) to elevate the Gamets and then freeze them.

strats.name: Jump Into IBJ
note: Jump into an IBJ from the moving platform (Kamer).
Although it is possible to do it without jumping, by starting next to the Gamet farm, it is harder and more obscure.

nodes.name: Post Crocomire Jump Room Left Door (to Grapple)
Post Crocomire Jump Room Top Door (to Shaft)

jumpways.name: Upper Left Power Bomb Block Platform
devNote: With HiJump this can be used coming up Main Street, the bottom left of Mt. Everest, and Pseudo Plasma Spark Room.
We could add other Power Bomb block platforms too (e.g. the lower ones, and on the right side), but they don't yet appear to have any application.

jumpways.name: Platform with Power Bomb Blocks Broken
Platform with Speed Blocks Broken
devNote: The tile next to the Power Bomb blocks is not counted as part of the jumpway, since using it would cause Samus to bonk.
A tricky jump is required because of the difficulty of avoiding the Power Bomb blocks and still reaching the door.

jumpways.name: Platform with Speed Blocks and Power Bomb Blocks Broken
devNote: This platform is for avoiding the canTrickyJump requirement when jumping left-to-right, if the Power Bomb blocks can be destroyed.
It also makes it possible to gain more speed by running a few tiles further, which is needed for certain strats.

nodes.name: Missile (Grapple Beam)
Post Crocomire Jump Room Junction (Speed Ramp, with Speed Blocks Broken)
note: This node strictly represents access to the speed ramp *with the speed blocks broken*.
If they can't be broken, this node is not considered accessible but node 5 might be.

nodes.name: Post Crocomire Jump Room Junction (Small Platforms)
note: This node represents the small platforms above the acid.
In some situations, it may be accessible without access to node 4, if the Speed blocks can't be broken.

strats.name: PCJR Left-Side Indiana Jones Shinespark
strats.note: Doesn't need hjb. Takes two walljumps, and must do the shinespark at the apex.

strats.name: Indiana Jones Grapple
strats.note: Involves grappling off several Ripper 2.

strats.name: PCJR Full Room Space Jump Through Speed Blocks
strats.note: The blocks can be broken if you can generate a blue suit using the previous room's runway, and carry it to the blocks by slowing floating down with Space Jump.

strats.name: Mella Farm
strats.note: Shoot the Mellas when they first begin to come on screen, and they will not move.

strats.name: Shinecharge
strats.note: Commonly known as a stutter-3, this is also doable as a 4-tap.

strats.name: Indiana Jones Grapple in Reverse
strats.note: Involves grappling off several Ripper 2.

strats.name: PCJR Walljump Shinespark to Grapple
strats.note: Fire off the shinespark at the apex of two consecutive walljumps.
strats.devNote: You can have a 'max' length runway available here if you break the PB blocks, but we won't duplicate strats for that right now.

strats.name: PCJR Big Jump Shinespark
strats.note: Charge a spark to the right, then come back, run and jump, and do a horizontal spark at the apex.
strats.devNote: You can have a 'max' length runway available here if you break the PB blocks, but we won't duplicate strats for that right now.

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.devNote: You can have a capped length runway available here if you break the PB blocks, but we won't duplicate strats for that right now.

strats.name: Speedjump
strats.note: Run on the moving platform (Kamer).

strats.name: PCJR Frozen Mella Door
note: Lure a Mella from the right by breaking the speed blocks or using Morph.
Then you need to manipulate it to go high enough to be used as a stepping stone once frozen.

strats.name: PCJR Springwall
note: A particularly precise springwall.
Aim the walljump at the bottom of the second sloped wall fixture, where it looks like you cant jump off of.
Optimize pause timing, use an instant morph, and get a max height springball jump. A delayed wall jump helps.

strats.name: Indy Jones Short Mella
note: Lure a Mella from the right by breaking the speed blocks or using Morph.
Then you need to manipulate it to go high enough to be used as a stepping stone once frozen.

strats.name: Indy Jones Long Mella
note: Lure a Mella from the right by breaking the speed blocks or using Morph.
Then you need to manipulate it to go high enough to be used as a stepping stone once frozen.

strats.name: Indy Jones Mella Ice Clip
note: Freeze the Mella at a precise location in order to jump through the crumble block, then wall jump up the long channel and mid air morph to get out.
The Mella pixel positioning window is larger and higher with Morph and an X-Ray Stand Up.

strats.name: PCJR Acid Shinespark
strats.note: Gravity makes it possible to charge a spark in the acid in order to break the speed blocks.
